item.title: Dead foc, 7th October
item.description:
There is a dead fox in the middle of the road blood on the road. It is on route to a primary school and will be distressing for young children
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lansdowne Drive, Hackney, London

item.title: High street litter in front of home owners driveways, 7th October
item.description:
Please remove the free parking in the street and introduce other measures to ensure people on the high street donâ€™t park and litter in a residential road. There are at all times people parked on Deepdene Road to eat their takeaways and leave rubbish behind. Kindly put up some signs to discourage public from throwing takeaway boxes on the street at least. It will be very beneficial if there is no free parking in this road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Deepdene Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unregulated school pickup traffic. This road needs to be made one way, 7th October
item.description:
During school collection and drop off this street is a nightmare of cars parked in front of residents driveways, on double yellows and it is a daily nightmare with people fighting with the elderly residents etc. it has become a big nuisance for homeowners and businesses who are just trying to go about their daily work and lives. There is no access to the street for residents during these times and the simplest solution is to make this street a one way.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Deepdene Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Students and church goers dropping rubbish on the streets, 7th October
item.description:
Unregulated access to vehicles and pedestrians attending the school and church has led to a huge rubbish problem. People going to the high street are always dumping take away boxes in the street and there is rubbish lying everywhere going into driveways. Kindly put up signs to discourage public from doing so and make the street one way so that it is more regulated and is not a regular nuisance for residents
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Deepdene Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unregulated school pickup traffic creates chaos, 7th October
item.description:
The school pick up traffic creates a daily nuisance for residents who cannot access their driveways. This has resulted in fights and accidents especially for older people in Deepdene Road and it must be made a one way for safety of the residents.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Deepdene Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet
